executable.title: Cameras
executable.description: This module manages 3D views and cameras.
executable.contributor: Julien Finet, Kitware, Sebastien Barre, Kitware Inc., Alex Yarmarkovich, Isomics Inc.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

parameters.label: Cameras
parameters.description: List the 3D views and cameras in the scene.

parameter.label: View
parameter.description: Select a 3D view. "View" is the main 3D view, additional 3D views are named "View_1", "View_2" etc. On selection, the view active camera is automatically selected.

parameter.label: Camera
parameter.description: Active camera of the view. Selecting a camera changes the view.
